reviews.sentence: breath taking. Hotel over looks the lake. Swimming pool is great. Staff very friendly. Rooms great. can not wait to go back.
Very nice hotel. Enjoyed the pool and lake. Stayed 1 night and enjoyed the pool pool bar service and surrounding plaza. Very comfortable bed.

Great Staff Great View Great Pool. Terrific customer service at this property. There was a power outage overnight while we were there not the Hiltons fault. The staff went out of their way to make us comfortable. We stayed in a 1 Br suite Fabulous and had an incredible lake view. Overall a terrific experience and we will definitely be back.
Wonderful lakefront hotel. We stayed in a large 2 room suite. It was huge and nicely decorated. Wonderful jacuzi tub. Good restaurants in walking distance to hotel.

The location of this hotel is perfect. From the pool there is a great view of the lake which is very nice. There are also several bars and restaurants within walking distance. The room was nice clean and comfortable. I would definitely recommend a stay.

Great property at a very reasonable rate. The pool area and lake view were awesome. I really liked that they had cushioned loungers available for free aside from the cabana rentals. The pool bar and food service did close a little early for summer nights. I would recommend they extend their hours for the summer especially when there are lots of people present.
Beautiful hotel great area. Loved the pool area our room overlooked it.
Beautiful rooms and pool. Excellent views very relaxing.

The Hilton Rockwal is a pretty great place to stay if you are wanting a nice relaxing weekend away though it seems to also be quite popular with wedding groups. My fiance and I stayed overnight for a short weekend of relaxation and we very much enjoyed our stay. The room was very clean the bed was comfortable and the bathroom was nice shower instead of a tub which I am not sure it is typical of the rooms because I believe we were in a handicap friendly room but we appreciated it. The pool is nice with cabanas set up around the perimeter it seems as though you can reserve them as well as plenty of seating options. The hotel bar is well stocked and the employees there seemed knowledgeable and friendly. If you do not mind spending a little extra and enjoy watching the sunset you should opt for a room with a view. the sunset over there lake is absolutely gorgeous and the rooms face in the perfect direction to get an awesome view of the sunset over the lake. You will not regret it. The hotel is also in a great location with several restaurants the movie theater and the harbor docks all within a very short walking distance. Book a boat cruise if you have the time. The only reason I am giving the hotel four stars is because I felt that the main hotel staff was being dismissive of us. I know that we look young so we often encounter people treating us as less than because they think we are barely past our teenage years but I assure you that they would be wrong in that assumption. You should always treat all paying customers with equal respect and courtesy and I simply felt like that was not happening. There was also an incident during breakfast where we were largely ignored by the staff until we finally managed to flag down an employee who I am pretty sure was not even actually supposed to be dealing with our table. Even the floor manager ignored us. Overall though the hotel was amazing and I am certain that anyone who actually looks their age will be treated more appropriately than we were.

Beautiful hotel. My room was on the top floor and had a gorgeous polside lake view. I had a short one night stay here so I did not get much of a chance to enjoy every amenity available but definitely look forward the next time I am in Dallas to have the opportunity to stay here again.

Nice location lots of parties. The hotel was fine and the employees were mostly polite and helpful. There is a shopping center and movie theater along with restaurants close by. The lake is nice and the onsite restaurant is OK. Our main issue involved the various parties held at this location. There was absolutely no where to park. When I asked the valets where guests could park I was told to ask the front desk. Really. Go inside and ask where to park. We went to dinner instead assuming things would die down afterward. We were very wrong as it only got worse. The second time I asked valet parking what to do a different gentleman was very helpful. After explaining that I needed to get my young children to sleep in preparation for a swim meet the next day he offered to take my keys and handle it for me. I was so grateful for his kindness. The only other issue is we had to request that our room be serviced on Sunday. Lesson. Always check with the hotel to see if a major event is going on when parking is limited and a quiet nights sleep is desired.
Good hotel. Always very accommodating. Pool area is very nice. Rooms are clean. Wish there was a spot by the pool to relax with a cigar.
Need to have more amenities like a game room jacuzi and sauna inside the hotel.

Some disappointments but made the most of it. All of the staff in the restaurant were amazing very attentive and exceeded expectations. Gerardo specifically stood out as well as other helpful staff at the front desk. We were extremely disappointed that we booked on booking non refundable and had NO NOTICE the pool was closed. We planned my daughters pool party at this hotel specifically due to the location and year round pool. We made the long drive and were only notified at checkin that the pool was closed only after my daughter was excited to look at the pool and was told she could not go look. I made notes specifically at booking to ensure the room was clean and there was hair on the pillows. The hair and dusty my film throughout the room was very obvious and could have been seen with even the smallest amount of detail. The coffee shop was closed an hour after the opening time and the lady just said “ sorry just got here ”. Side note she smelt heavily of cigarette smoke. The espresso machine had dried milk on the wands which is disgusting because the espresso machine had not been opened up yet. so the milk was from the prior day or worse. days before.

Man. Nice. I did nt use the valet service to park I got lucky on a close spot. The guys working valet were very nice and offered to get any bags for me. Check in was easy and quick were busy too. Room seemed a lil bigger than average hotel room even with two queen beds. Had amazing view of lake and pool from second floor room see pics. Hotel and room were immaculate. Ate at bar for dinner and had breakfast next two mornings food was really good. Cinemark theatre and other things within walking distance. Temperature was nt that bad like low 60s so I was the only one that seemed to use the pool. During warm weather I bet it fills up early. Good amount of chairs and lounge couches but I would still go down early and claim a spot early when weather gets nicer. what else there is in room dining services but I did nt use. Housekeeping gets rolling early so put a door hanger out if you do nt need. I will definitely bring the wife back this summer. Great stay.

Exceptional. LOVED THE LOCATION AND THE POOL WITH HOT TUB. SATURDAY EVENING THEY HAD A MOVIEPLAYING ON THE WALL SO YOU CAN WATCH WHILE BEING AT THE POOL. POOL DID CLOSE AT 10PMWHICH WAS FINE WITH ME. THE DRINKS WERE GOOD WITH QUALITY LIQUORNOT A THING.

Good enough for our stay. The location was good for our trip. The room was large enough to accommodate a Pack n Play for a baby. The pool area is nice and the servers there were very attentive. Great breakfast at the restaurant and reasonable prices at the bar. I think the room was a bit overpriced although it was a holiday weekend. The room is pretty standard so I do not think the rate was justified. The housekeeping was lacking. We had to ask for the babys Pack n Play even though it was in the reservation. We also had to call for housekeeping when do not disturb was not on our door. When housekeeping did come they did not restock all of the supplies like coffee cups etc. we had to call again for those separately. The pool at night was packed with teens who were hopping the fence to get in. they were probably not supposed to be there.

We stayed at the Hilton to celebrate our 23rd wedding anniversary. I was immediately disappointed when we entered the room. While it appeared to be recently updated the fabric on the chair was faded worn and torn. The bathroom was so small you had to stand in between the toilet and the sink or shower to close the door. The water was hot but the pressure was extremely low. To make matters worse our key had to be reprogramed several time during our overnight stay and even the Hilton Honors ap access did not work. While sitting in the bar we had the pleasure of witnessing a guest assisting their 4 5 year old son to urinate in the bushes near the pool. The friendly and accommodating staff are the only reason I am giving two stars. We will definitely not be returning.

This place is great and convenient as it has quick access to the lakefront and great views. One problem is that you have to pay extra for breakfast unles you have Diamond status when I was there it was movie night at the pool where they project a movie onto the side of the building. A good idea in theory but in reality they had huge technical difficulties and never got the movie going the audio was too quiet or non existent and the sound pollution from the pool itself would have made it unwatchable in itself.

Decent stay. Our room was clean when we arrived and we had a comfortable sleep. Room service was good and so was the restaurant. The only negative is the same issue we had last year. We were in town for a swim meet so we arrived back at the hotel pretty tired. Parking is just insufficient for this hotel. I do not know if it is the time of year or not but there is absolutely no parking available in the evenings. Also we were told to request late checkout on the morning of departure instead of in advance. Other hotels have allowed me to pay for this in advance so that was different. When we called down as told they gave us 30 extra minutes. When returned to change from the swim meet our room had already been cleaned for the next guest our key worked. We did not feel comfortable ruining the next guests experience so we just left.
